name: P Square Technologies
overview:
Year of Establishment 2009, Today, we have carved a niche as one of the fastest growing Industrial engineering equipment manufacturers and suppliers based in India. Backed by a finely distributed network, we have been successfully catering to the esteemed clients based in the country and abroad.

Our Products: Conveying System Pollution Control Equipment Bag Filter Galvanised Silos Hoppers and Bunkers Storage Tanks Industrial Fabrication Erection Services rying System Industrial Mixers

INDUSTRIES WE SERVE: We are a well managed organization engaged in manufacturing and exporting of high tech engineering equipments.

MISSION: At P Square Technologies our aim is “the constant up gradation of our machinery and continuous improvement through latest manufacturing techniques”.

INFRASTRUCTURE: With our manufacturing unit based in Pune with all the facilities which are required for qualitative production we qualify in delivering the best of the product range we manufacture.

QUALITY ASSURANCE: As far as quality issue is concerned we are very particular in our action. We comply and follow set industrial patterns and rules for quality control as per set standards. We have good financial position & TQM that supports our large product line with all the OEM capabilities. Through this proven success record of our effective and prompt services, we are able to sustain prolific and mutually beneficial business terms with our clients.
